name: EpilepsyTonicClonicICD10CM
title: Epilepsy Tonic Clonic (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: ),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify diagnosis codes for tonic clonic or convulsive seizures.),(Inclusion Criteria: ),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes unspecified seizure diagnostic codes and diagnostic codes for forms of epilepsy that would not be indicative of convulsive seizure activity.)
